X.iii.1.A.1.d
.
Use of VA Form 10-7132
Historically, VA medical facilities have used
VA Form 10-7132
to notify ROs of changes in a patient’s status.  Although the deployment of CAPRI has substantially reduced the need for use of this form, personnel at VA medical facilities still occasionally use it for purposes such as notifying ROs of changes in the statuses of Veterans residing in contract nursing homes.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A  - Reports of Hospitalization and Other Information Exchanges Between Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Regional Offices (ROs) and Medical Facilities
citation: Part X, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
